Do you support the repeal of 'Don't Ask, Don't Tell'? Why or why not.

post_info.post_title: Do You Support 'Don't Ask, Don't Tell' Repeal

There's no option for "I could care less". 
 
 Gays currently serve. I have no problem with that. 
 
 Now, according to new policy, they can serve openly. I have no problem with that either. 
 
 There are far greater injustices in this country to quibble over whether gays should be allowed to serve openly. 
 
 Besides, it's a dead issue. The policy has been repealed. Hooray! Now we can stop talking about it and move on to things like how are we going to fix the economy and millions of starving and homeless people...

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Do You Support 'Don't Ask, Don't Tell' Repeal
